Package com.esri.mo2.map.core

Defines Layout, Map, and MapElement-related interfaces that could be implemented as either visual or non-visual components.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AcetateLayer An AcetateLayer is a layer that could be added to a Map object and sits on top of other map layers.
BackgroundLayer This interface defines the APIs for an element's background layer.
BorderLayer This interface defines the APIs for an element's border layer.
Canvas defines methods that are common to both a Map and a Layout.
DropshadowLayer This interface defines the APIs for an element's drop shadow layer.
Element An Element object is a kind of map data that could be added to any ElementContainer and Layout objects for either client and server sides.
ElementContainer An ElementContainer is a kind of container that manipulate Element objects added to it.
GroupElement A GroupElement is an ordered collection of Element(s).
Layout Layout interface adds more functionality on top of the ElementContainer such as getting all the added elements, selected elements and MapElement(s), and creating images for the given size and extent including thumbnail images for the whole layout.
Legend A Legend is an explanation of map contents which are consisted of a series of layers.
Map This interface identifies an object as a Map.
NorthArrow NorthArrow interface defines a set of methods needed for a NorthArrow object.
OverviewMap This class displays one or more layers on a Map at a larger extent compared with the Map.
ScaleBar ScaleBar interface defines a set of methods to draw a ScaleBar to a given graphic context and getter/setter methods for accessing the properties of a ScaleBar objects.
 

Class Summary
BaseLayout A layout component that implements Layout model interface.
ElementCursor ElementCursor is kind of cursor that will walk through a selection set that returns an Element.
 

Package com.esri.mo2.map.core Description

Defines Layout, Map, and MapElement-related interfaces that could be implemented as either visual or non-visual components.

This package contains a Layout interface defining functionality of aPageLayout, a Map interface defining functionality a map should have, and an Element interface defining functionality of a map element. The ElementContainer interface defines methods for manipulating elements it contains. NorthArrow, OverviewMap, ScaleBar, and Legend interfaces define sets of common methods for each type of element, respectively. The AcetateLayer defines a special type of layer that can be added to a Map. The BackgroundLayer, BorderLayer, and DropshadowLayer define various supporting objects that can be associated with an Element for its background, border, and dropshadow properties. Some of these interfaces are implemented in the package com.esri.mo2.map.elt. Please see com.esri.mo2.map.elt package description.
